hibernate-mapping.query: from InstructorRecordImpl as participant where participant.learningContext=:course
from EnrollmentRecordImpl as participant where participant.learningContext=:course
select record.user from ParticipationRecordImpl as record where record.user.userUid=:userUid and record.learningContext in ( from CourseImpl as course where course.siteContext=:siteContext )
from TeachingAssistantRecordImpl as participant where participant.learningContext=:course
from ParticipationRecordImpl as participant where participant.learningContext=:course and participant.user.userUid=:userUid
from ParticipationRecordImpl as participant where participant.learningContext.uuid=:sectionUuid
from InstructorRecordImpl as participant where participant.learningContext=:section
from EnrollmentRecordImpl as participant where participant.learningContext=:section
from TeachingAssistantRecordImpl as participant where participant.learningContext=:section
from ParticipationRecordImpl as participant where participant.learningContext=:section and participant.user.userUid=:userUid
from EnrollmentRecordImpl as enr where enr.user.userUid=:userUid and enr.learningContext.uuid=:sectionUuid
from EnrollmentRecordImpl as enr where enr.user.userUid=:userUid and enr.learningContext in ( from CourseSectionImpl as section where section.course=:course and section.category=:category )

from EnrollmentRecordImpl as enr where enr.user.userUid in (:userUids) and enr.learningContext in ( from CourseSectionImpl as section where section.course=:course and section.category=:category and section.uuid != :sectionUuid )
from ParticipationRecordImpl as participation where participation.learningContext.uuid=:sectionUuid and participation.user.userUid=:userUid

from EnrollmentRecordImpl as enr where enr.user.userUid=:studentUid and enr.learningContext in ( from CourseSectionImpl as section where section.course.siteContext=:siteContext and section.category=:category )
select count(enr) from EnrollmentRecordImpl as enr where enr.learningContext.uuid=:learningContextUuid
from ParticipationRecordImpl as record where record.learningContext.uuid=:sectionUuid

select courseEnr from EnrollmentRecordImpl as courseEnr where courseEnr.learningContext.uuid=:courseUuid and courseEnr.user.userUid not in ( select secEnr.user.userUid from EnrollmentRecordImpl as secEnr where secEnr.learningContext in ( from CourseSectionImpl as section where section.course.uuid=:courseUuid and section.category=:category ) )

from EnrollmentRecordImpl as courseEnr where courseEnr.learningContext.uuid=:courseUuid and courseEnr.user.userUid not in ( select secEnr.user.userUid from EnrollmentRecordImpl as secEnr where secEnr.learningContext in ( from CourseSectionImpl as section where section.course.uuid=:courseUuid ) )

from TeachingAssistantRecordImpl as courseTa where courseTa.learningContext.uuid=:courseUuid and courseTa.user.userUid not in ( select secTa.user.userUid from TeachingAssistantRecordImpl as secTa where secTa.learningContext in ( from CourseSectionImpl as section where section.course.uuid=:courseUuid ) )
from EnrollmentRecordImpl as enr where enr.user.userUid=:userUid and enr.learningContext.id in ( select section.id from CourseSectionImpl as section where section.course.uuid = :courseUuid )
from ParticipationRecordImpl as record where record.user.userUid not in (:userUids) and record.learningContext in ( from CourseSectionImpl as section where section.course.siteContext = :siteContext )
from ParticipationRecordImpl as record where record.user.userUid=:userUid and record.learningContext in ( from CourseImpl as course where course.siteContext=:siteContext )
from ParticipationRecordImpl as record where record.user.userUid=:userUid and record.learningContext.uuid=:sectionUuid
from ParticipationRecordImpl as membership where membership.user.userUid=:userUid and membership.learningContext in (from CourseImpl as course)

from ParticipationRecordImpl as record where record.user.userUid=:userUid and record.learningContext.id in ( select section.id from CourseSectionImpl as section where section.course.siteContext = :siteContext )
select record.user.userUid from ParticipationRecordImpl as record where record.learningContext in ( from CourseImpl as course where course.siteContext = :siteContext )
